statements: DELETE FROM MoistureRecords WHERE compost_id = 3 AND recorded_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MoistureRecords WHERE compost_id = 100 AND recorded_at < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM heap_locations WHERE location LIKE '%Garden%';
DELETE FROM heap_locations WHERE setup_time > '2022-03-15' AND heap_id = 5;
DELETE FROM moisture_log WHERE heap_id = 3 AND moisture_level < 4.5
DELETE FROM compost_manager WHERE user_id = 1 AND heap_id = 1
DELETE FROM heap_location WHERE location = 'Backyard' AND heap_id IN (SELECT id FROM compost_heap WHERE heap_name = 'Green Heap')
